title: Sá Cardoso (Alfredo Ernesto de)
body: He was the Civil Governor of Madeira, appointed by decree of March 20, 1913, and took office on the 27th of the same month and year. In June 1919, he was the Prime Minister.

Alfredo Ernesto de Sá Cardoso: Civil Governor of Madeira and Prime Minister

1913: Appointment as Civil Governor of Madeira
